Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Services

Localization of user and Downloading-storing-uploading data

See:
          Description

Class Summary
DatabaseHandler Handles all operations for storing locally a subset of the remote MySQL of IMC to local SQLite
Download_Data This class performs any download of data from remote server
InternetConnCheck Instant check if connect to internet
Security Authenticate the user using a username and password.
Service_Data It is a controller to decide when to update local database.
Service_Location Find current location and broadcast if location has changed
Upload_Data Major methods to upload data to remote server are gathered in this class
 

Package com.mk4droid.IMC_Services Description

Localization of user and Downloading-storing-uploading data
